text: Lewis Montgomery (died 1568), of Ecton, Northamptonshire, was an English politician. ==Family== Montgomery married Jane Lane; they had no surviving children and his heirs were his siblings. ==Education and career== He was educated at Gray's Inn. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Northampton in 1563; he had also been returned for Dorchester but chose Northampton. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1568 deaths Category:English MPs 1563–1567 Category:Members of Gray's Inn Category:People from Ecton, Northamptonshire
title: Lewis Montgomery
